DataElement.preferredName: Progressive Disease Post First Therapy Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether a tumor has continued to progress (to grow or worsen) during or after initial treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the diagnosis or recognition of the presence and nature of the return of signs and symptoms of cancer after a period of improvement._A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity. (NCI)_Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cancer that is increasing in scope or severity.

Concepts.definition: A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.

Property.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes, No, or Unknown to represent a condition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient experience first episode of progressive disease during aggressive multi-drug front line therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient experience first episode of progressive high-risk disease during aggressive multi-drug frontline high-risk therapy?
